name: Hotkeys to Switch Tabs Left and Right with alts
description: In case you need more keyboard shortcuts to change tabs.

left-tab.description: Switch to tab to the left (up)

right-tab.description: Switch to tab to the right (down)

right-tab-alt.description: Alternative switch to tab to the right (down)
